data.title: List of All Movies Released in 1978
data.meta_description: List of all movies released in 1978, with film trailers when available. These movies of 1978 are listed alphabetically, but if you're looking for a particular ...
data.text:
List of all movies released in 1978, with film trailers when available. These movies of 1978 are listed alphabetically, but if you're looking for a particular film, you can search for it by using the Filter option below. This list includes some of the best movies of 1978, but since it's a list of all 1978 films there are also some bad movies on here as well. Additional information is also available for these 1978 movies, such as their directors, actors and taglines.

List ranges from National Lampoon's Animal House to Superman, plus much more.

If you're wondering, "What movies came out in 1978?" or "What are the best 1978 films?" then this list will answer your questions.

This is a comprehensive list of movies that premiered in 1978, so the films you see here range from smaller indie pictures to giant blockbusters. If you're a big cinema buff, this list is a great way to find some more obscure films that you may not already know. {#nodes}
